technologies.heroSubtitle: Discover the innovative technologies powering the future of mobility

visum.title: Visum Mesoscopic Model​
visum.subtitle: A mesoscopic traffic demand prediction and operation evaluation model

howItWorks: Uses SBA (Simulation Based Assignment) with dynamic traffic assignment.
Considers time-varying traffic volume and road capacity for precise forecasting.
Connects with Vissim micro-simulation for detailed scenario evaluations.
whatItCanDo: Predicts traffic demand and congestion for large developments and major events (e.g., Olympics, Expos).
Supports optimal traffic signal plans under different development conditions.
Enables efficient, scalable traffic operation analysis for new projects.
whereItCanBeUsed: Traffic operation centers and government agencies.
Consulting projects in Korea, Saudi Arabia, UAE, Southeast Asia.

vissim.title: Vissim Microscopic Model​
vissim.subtitle: A detailed micro-simulation tool for replicating vehicle interactions

howItWorks: Connects with Visum meso-model outputs for micro-level traffic operation analysis.
Uses vehicle trajectory data for scenario evaluations.
Supports high-resolution simulation and validation of traffic control strategies.
whatItCanDo: Analyze intersection performance and optimize traffic signals.
Evaluate traffic impacts from new transport policies and infrastructure.
Generate VR/AR and driving simulator inputs for immersive scenario testing.
whereItCanBeUsed: Traffic impact assessments for new developments.
VR/AR visualizations for public agencies and transport strategy.

mesh.title: 3D Mesh Model and Visualisation
mesh.subtitle: High-quality 3D mesh models of roads and urban infrastructure for advanced visualization.

howItWorks: Uses LX data, OSM, LiDAR, and photogrammetry for 3D mesh creation.
Integrates with Visum and Vissim simulation data in Unity for seamless visual outputs.
Allows manual mesh refinement for accurate elevation and asset placement.
whatItCanDo: Create high-quality visual materials for transport policy and project communication.
Support driving simulators and VR environments for safety and operational evaluation.
Enable clear scenario comparison and visualization for non-expert stakeholders.
whereItCanBeUsed: Projects in Saudi, UAE, and Southeast Asia markets.

digitalTwin.title: Digital Twin Model
digitalTwin.subtitle: A real-time digital replica of traffic networks integrated with 3D visual environments.

howItWorks: Combines Visum meso, Vissim micro-simulations, and 3D models.
Updates dynamically with scenario changes and planned infrastructure.
Connects to ITS systems for real-time traffic visualization and scenario playback.
whatItCanDo: Visualize future traffic impacts of developments and events.
Optimize signal timing and traffic management strategies.
Enhance stakeholder understanding through immersive scenario demonstrations.
whereItCanBeUsed: Government policy testing and scenario analysis.
Public communication and VR scenario demonstrations.

solutions.heroSubtitle: Discover our suite of innovative solutions designed to transform urban mobility and smart city operations.

trafficAnalysis.title: Traffic Analysis Tool
desc: Analyze traffic conditions and scenario-based response strategies.
Analyze policies and traffic response strategies; optimize traffic flow.
Dashboard-type interface enhances user accessibility and analytical comprehension.

drivingSimulator.title: Driving Simulator
desc: Test drive actual or planned roads in virtual environments to identify issues.
Verify and refine road design functionalities.
Can be used as part of educational programs for safe driving and design validation.

vrRoadDesign.title: VR Road Design & Verification
desc: Move beyond traditional 2D road design with immersive virtual environments.
Simulate installations of facilities and environmental changes within VR.
Verify safety aspects like visibility and sight distance under various conditions.

visualisation.title: Visualisation
desc: Create high-definition videos based on digital twin environments.
Reflect realistic traffic behaviors for lifelike presentations.
Use in public hearings, policy promotions, and presentations.
Considered a required deliverable for major city projects globally.

multimodal.title: Multimodal Simulation
desc: Integrated multimodal simulation tool reflecting interaction between various transportation modes.
Connect with simulator hardware to test diverse scenarios in virtual environments.
Build foundational datasets for autonomous vehicle development.

teleDriving.title: Tele-driving
desc: Remote driving support for autonomous vehicles during exceptional circumstances.
Allows human intervention when autonomous driving faces limitations (heavy snow, construction zones).
Applicable in mobility services, logistics, and military operations.

projects.heroSubtitle: Explore our portfolio of innovative mobility and smart city projects.

naepo.title: Digital Twin Model for Naepo New City
naepo.explanation: Dochak will position itself as a regional mobility innovation leader in Chungnam by using digital twins and simulation for traffic solutions. It will develop Korea's first traffic-focused digital twin for Naepo New City, supporting advanced mobility planning and operations. Dochak will build demonstration and simulation facilities, collaborating with local companies for ongoing education and promotion. It will create local employment opportunities, supporting the local ecosystem while expanding Dochak's advanced ITS and mobility business.

teleDriving.title: Tele-driving between Daejeon and Jeju
teleDriving.explanation: Provides remote driver intervention when autonomous vehicles encounter issues, addressing limitations of autonomous systems. Enables safe operation in challenging environments such as heavy snow or construction zones. Applicable across mobility services, logistics, and defense sectors.

form.name: Name
form.success: Thank you for reaching out! We'll get back to you soon.

startup.title: Startup Stage
startup.content1: Completed foundational R&D for simulator digital twin and automated systems with core element technology acquisition.
startup.content2: Built cooperation system with ITS companies and 3D model environment companies to enhance product accuracy and quality.
startup.content3: Developing a metropolitan city-centered micro mobility model for June 2025 completion.

growth.title: Growth Stage
growth.content1: Improved the Dochak website to showcase partner and client models based on real-time models.
growth.content2: Promoted the company via LinkedIn and targeted SNS channels.
growth.content3: Participated in domestic academic mobility exhibitions for company promotion.
growth.content4: Built early customer pipeline using existing networks and expanded partnership channels.

expansion.title: Expansion Stage
expansion.content1: Focused on maturing projects and product advancements to a scalable, stable pipeline.

stabilization.title: Stabilization and Growth Stage
stabilization.content1: Operated stably while expanding B2B and public agency partnerships, and started continuous technology development.
